name: Hang-Man
description:
Hang Man Game

Instructions:

Click on a letter to see if the letter is part of the word. If it is, it will show up in the answer. If not, a body part will show up.  Number of asterisks are the hint to the word. Game is over after 6 Failed attempts.

MODS:

1) Fantasy Skybox

2) 3 Different topics (Fruits, House Objects, Sports)

3) Win/Loose event system

Credits: 

Created by Mario Edwards
